steps.title: Using the first shape as a reference, draw several other lines to make it look like it has multiple pages.
steps.content: Using the first shape as a reference, draw several other lines to make it look like it has multiple pages.

steps.title: Start adding the words.
steps.content: Start adding the words. What kind of headlines do you want on the front page?.

steps.title: Add more details, like photos, banners, and the lines of text.
steps.content: Add more details, like photos, banners, and the lines of text.

steps.title: Paint it using a soft grey and a darker tone for the rest of the pages.
steps.content: Paint it using a soft grey and a darker tone for the rest of the pages.

steps.title: Draw two rectangular shapes placed on top of each other.
steps.content: Draw two rectangular shapes placed on top of each other.

steps.title: Erase the lines inside the first rectangle.
steps.content: Erase the lines inside the first rectangle. Now draw lines and write the word “News” on the first rectangle.

steps.title: Illustrate the content on the front of the newspaper.
steps.content: Illustrate the content on the front of the newspaper. Do so by drawing a series of small elongated rectangles on the first rectangle.

steps.title: Repeat the previous step for the back of the newspaper.
steps.content: Repeat the previous step for the back of the newspaper. Do so by drawing the small elongated rectangles on the second rectangle.

steps.title: Outline your artwork by inking over your penciled drawings.
steps.content: Outline your artwork by inking over your penciled drawings. Then clean up your drawing by erasing your penciled artwork.

steps.title: Color!
steps.content: Color! Use shades of gray to make it as realistic as possible.
